citeinfo.origin: NJ Office of Information Technology (NJOIT), Office of Geographic Information Systems (OGIS)
citeinfo.title: NJ TRANSIT Bus Stop Locations, March, 2015 (NAD83, NJSP feet)

pubinfo.publish: NJ Office of Information Technology (NJOIT), Office of Geographic Information Systems (OGIS)

descript.abstract: Point data showing bus stops for bus lines operated by NJ TRANSIT. Each record is related to bus line and route direction (operating position) - outbound or inbound relatively to a garage, or big cities: New York, Newark, Philadelphia.
descript.purpose:
Provides location and attribute information for current regional bus service operated by NJ TRANSIT.
These data are for general planning and cartography only, not for trip planning and scheduling, Updated by OIT-OGIS quarterly. However, NJ TRANSIT makes changes much more frequently. Up-to-date data are available directly from NJ TRANSIT via their GTFS data distribution mechanism as described in theDistribution Information section - Standard Order Process - Ordering Instructions. The GTFS data are suitable for trip planning and scheduling.
descript.supplinf:
This shapefile does not include linear referencing m values.
These data are re-published by NJ Office of Information Technology (NJOIT), Office of Geographic Information Systems (OGIS) under agreement with NJ TRANSIT - GIS-Transportation.

idinfo.useconst:
See Purpose and Data Quality sections for conditions that limit appropriate uses.
Acknowledgement of the data set providers, NJ TRANSIT, GIS-Transportation and NJ Office of Information Technology (NJOIT), Office of Geographic Information Systems (OGIS), would be appreciated for maps, data or other products derived from this data set.
The State of New Jersey makes great effort to provide secure, accurate, and complete data and metadata. However, portions of the data and metadata may be incorrect or not current. Any errors or omissions should be reported for investigation.
The State of New Jersey, its officers, employees or agents shall not be liable for damages or losses of any kind arising out of or in connection with the use or performance of data and metadata, including but not limited to, damages or losses caused by reliance upon the accuracy or timeliness of any such data and metadata, or damages incurred from the viewing, distributing, or copying of those materials.
The data and metadata are provided "as is." No warranty of any kind, implied, expressed, or statutory, including but not limited to the warranties of non-infringement of third party rights, title, merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and freedom from computer virus, is given with respect to the data and metadata, or its hyperlinks to other Internet resources.
The State disclaims any duty or obligation either to maintain availability of or to update the data and metadata.
idinfo.datacred: Source data in shapefile format are provided by Glenn D. Newman PLS, PP, Director of GIS-Transportation at NJ TRANSIT. Data are processed by NJ Office of Information Technology (NJOIT), Office of Geographic Information Systems (OGIS).

attracc.attraccr: Status of attribute checks not provided.

dataqual.logic: All features provided by NJ TRANSIT. The stops are not related topologically to the bus route lines.
dataqual.complete: Includes only portions of stops currently used by passenger bus service. Does not include information from privately-operated bus lines.

procstep.procdesc: Shapefiles sent by NJ TRANSIT were re-projected to State Plane coordinate system and exported to a file geodatabase feature class and publishable shapefile. Metadata created.

cntorgp.cntorg: NJ Office of Information Technology (NJOIT), Office of Geographic Information Systems (OGIS)

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Distance from location reference ( in feet)
Stated direction in 90 degree increments (N,S,E,W) from the stated intersection to the stop location, applies to Mid-block stops only
The street direction in 90 degree increments (N,S,E,W) that the stop is located on

distinfo.distliab: Distribution Liability: The State of New Jersey provides this product "as is". The State makes no guarantee or warranty concerning the accuracy of information contained in the data. Also, the State makes no warranty, either expressed or implied, regarding the condition of the product or its fitness for any particular purpose. The burden for determining fitness for use lies entirely with the user. Although these data files have been processed successfully on computers at the State, no warranty is made by the State regarding the use of the data on any other system, nor does the fact of distribution constitute or imply such a warranty.

stdorder.ordering: Download from NJGIN Explorer data downloads page.

distinfo.distliab: See conditions and disclaimers on NJ Transit developer Web site.

stdorder.ordering:
In order to access GTFS data, you must sign up for an account on the NJ Transit site for developers. Registration for GTFS data, and info on use, also on web service of train status https://www.njtransit.com/mt/mt_servlet.srv?hdnPageAction=MTDevLoginTo
The rail and bus data are zipped GTFS files. They include both spatial data in GTFS format and schedule data.
